Description:
Family Flexibility with Amazing Outdoor Space!
Tucked away in a family-friendly cul-de-sac, this attractive home occupies an exceptionally large block (approx 672sqm) providing a ready-to-enjoy indoor/outdoor lifestyle along with
opportunities to further enhance or possibly sub-divide in the future (STCA).
Every room filled with natural light, the home's inviting interior comprises 3 bedrooms (all with built-in robes) complemented by a spotless central bathroom with double shower & separate WC. Add to this a spacious lounge leading through to the open dining area & adjoining kitchen with new oven, plus the added appeal of a full-size laundry, gas heating, ducted evaporative cooling, alarm system & motorised security shutters.
Outside, discover a large undercover entertaining patio overlooking the incredibly wide backyard garden with lush lawn area, handy workshop and large storeroom, as well as an oversized double garage (remote-controlled) & additional off-street parking.
Walking distance to Hothlyn Drive buses, primary and secondary schools, local parks & Aitken
Creek trails, it's also close to close to childcare centres & kindergartens, the convenience of Craigieburn Station & easy access to the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 4 St Austell Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
With an abundance of natural light this home is located in one of Craigieburn's most convenient locations. Located within 750m from Craigieburn Plaza and 3km from Craigieburn Central, 1.3km from Craigieburn train station, 1km from The Craigieburn Sports & Leisure Centre, 1.5km from freeway entrances and walking tracks & parks within easy reach. This home is perfect for the first home buyer, investor, downsizer or even the small family looking at getting into the market. On a block of 359m2(approx.) with features including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, updated kitchen, bathroom, laundry, walk-in robe study nook, off street parking and much more. With restrictions easing this one won't last so call now.

Description:
Approved Potential in Central Craigieburn!
*** This property is available for inspection by appointment - Please contact us to arrange a suitable time ****
In an established residential neighbourhood with close proximity to the best of Craigieburn, this unique allotment comes complete with approved planning permit and endorsed plans to construct a sensational new two-storey residence. Accompanying plans highlight an impressive freestanding home with an intelligent design comprising three bedrooms (all with robes), master ensuite, main central bathroom and guest powder room (third WC). Add to this an open-plan living/dining area and adjoining kitchen, along with a full-size laundry and sunny back garden, plus internally-accessed garage and additional driveway parking space. With a total land area in the vicinity of 195 square metres, the block's appeal is further enhanced by its uniform dimensions, minimal gradient and general residential zoning (GRZ1), plus all services available including the NBN. Easy access to the area's key lifestyle attractions including local parks and Malcolm Creek trails, Hanson Road buses, popular primary and secondary schools, it's also close to a choice of shopping centres, as well as Craigieburn Station and the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 32 Southern Crescent, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Titled Land In The Trijena Estate !!
Located in the Trijena Estate one of the fastest growing suburbs, is this block of land 313m2. Positioned perfectly within the estate, this premiere land provides easy access to the Hume Highway and is only minutes to Stockland Highlands, Highlands Medical Centre, Hume Anglican Grammar and Donnybrook Station. For generations, Trijena has been a family owned property, which takes its name from the names of the three children who enjoyed a life of country style freedom amongst the groves of tall trees. Today, you and your family have the opportunity to be the new generation of Trijena.
The Mickleham area has emerged as a premier residential location within the city's rapidly growing northern reaches and demand for its special 'open space' lifestyle is growing.
Living at Trijena will redefine convenience. In addition to an established range of transportation options and amenities which are within minutes of Trijena, an ever expanding future is unfolding around you, including; future primary and secondary state and private schools, a future Mickleham town centre and a recently opened business park which is predicted to provide 25,000 new jobs.
Don't let this opportunity pass by, call now to enquire before it's too late
Insights: 13 Trijena Avenue, Mickleham VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Brand New Metricon Master Piece
If you need plenty of space for the family, this fantastic newly built home is certainly one to take into consideration. With its instant street appeal, a perfect floor plan & on a great family-sized allotment of 392m2, this amazing Metricon home will accommodate all your family's needs.
A sun-drenched living area that features a stone benchtop kitchen with a walk-in pantry overlooking an open plan dining & family room is only the beginning of what this home has to offer. A large private master bedroom, with ensuite & walk-in-robe, is separated completely from the other 3 bedrooms ensuring plenty of parental privacy with the added bonus of a separate living room & sparkling bathroom equating to a great family home.
Loaded with quality extras including a double remote garage with internal access, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar gas boosted hot water service, LED downlights to entry & living areas, letterbox, clothesline, alarm & professionally landscaped gardens all around.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops & suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child & Community Centre & beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by. Don't miss out on this sensational offering, call today!
Insights: 611 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Live the GRAND LIFE @ Mt Ridley !
This magnificent 448m2 parcel of land is perfectly orientated to capture the panoramic views of the city skyline and surrounding areas. This block is located in the prestigious pocket of exceptional home sites within Mt Ridley.
Walking distance to Hume Anglican Grammar School and Mt Ridley Conservation Reserve. This location gives you and easy access to Hume Freeway and is close to all amenities such as Major Shopping Centres, Childcare and Community Centres, Highlands Hotel and top level sporting facilities for Tennis, Football, Hockey, Cricket, swimming etc
This titled block will not last long.
Call now to secure the block

Description:
Family can move into your brand new home, NOW.
Be enthralled laying your eyes on this 6 bedroom dream.
Beautifully laid out allowing for any family size.
Quality floorboards downstairs flow from the entrance to the family /meals / amazing kitchen area. Discover square set cornices, and feature ceilings.
Stylish, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and microwave.
Wander out to the beautifully fitted out alfresco, or reside in the rumpus and enjoy your own movie experience with projector and screen.
Guest bedroom downstairs has robe and ensuite, as does the upstairs master. Here views to the north are outstanding. Sitting area, study nook, and a further four bedrooms are all on this level.
Modern conveniences of refrigerative cooling, ducted heating, DLUG with remote and panel lift door, and highest quality carpets upstairs, to all bedrooms and to rumpus down.

Description:
Perfect First Home or Impressive Investment!
This single-level quality home is ideal for first-time buyers or perfect investment opportunity with its free-flowing design, a long list of features & low-maintenance surrounds. You will be impressed by your first step into this three-bedroom home which has been masterfully appointed with classy and stylish fixtures and fittings throughout.
The home's inviting interior comprises 3 spacious bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe), Every room filled with natural light, stylish ensuite & main central bathroom - both with floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this a versatile open-plan huge living area adjoining dining area accompanied by a sleek stone-bench kitchen with tiled, stainless steel appliances, heating, split system, outdoor entertaining area, landscaped backyard gardens to both the front and rear yards and double lock-up garage.--
* High square-set ceilings throughout
* Spacious Laundry and lots of storage
* Public Transport Short Drive away
* Easy access onto the Freeway & Local Schools
* Minutes away from the Upcoming Business Center & all the amenities--
This is a rare gem that ticks all the boxes of modern, low maintenance living with room for the entire family. Inspect today and you will not be disappointed.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Prime Location For Your Next Build!

Description:
Live Like a King
Sale by Closing Date: Saturday 6th June, 2pm. (Unless Sold Prior)
Set amongst the most prestigious homes in Craigieburn's premier location, this grand family home caters for the whole family. Standing high and proud, with a striking street presence & an impressive porch you are greeted with a wide entrance leading to an elegant formal lounge featuring a bulkhead ceiling, guest bedroom or large study/office with easy access to the powder room.
The heart of home is a beautiful well equipped kitchen with its quality smeg appliances, butler's pantry and stone bench top which is open to spacious meals and family areas including a wood fireplace and leading to a decked pergola provides a great living space for the whole family.
Upstairs you'll find a hotel style master's retreat and three more generous sized bedrooms with built in robes serviced by a sparkling central bathroom and spa. In addition, there is a huge rumpus room connecting to a large balcony with breathtaking views of the Melbourne city to enjoy.
Entertaining guests will be a breeze with the presence of another large undercover outdoor area completed with electric fittings and fully landscaped gardens in a tranquil setting. There is also an approved side driveway with a carport and massive paved area which is perfect for boat or trailer and provides ample car accommodation.
Features are numerous and include zoned refrigerated heating/cooling, video intercom, dishwasher, family sized laundry, double remote garage with rear roller door and internal access, down lights throughout the house, security alarm & cameras, split system heating/cooling in the master bedroom, abundance of natural light, polished timber staircase, balcony, garden shed, extra storage options and all this on a big block of 843m2.
Located in Mt Ridley Estate and within minutes of Craigieburn & highlands shopping centres, public transport, parks, freeway access and schools; Hume Anglican Grammar, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary and Mount Ridley College.
If you're looking to accommodate in a top location and need an abundance of living areas, this double storey split level mansion is a must see. Be quick to inspect before it's gone!
PHOTO ID REQUIRED

Description:
A Sensational Entry into Merrifield!
Why buy land & build when you can enjoy an exceptional Merrfield lifestyle now!
This impressive brand new Henley home provides a ready-to-enjoy environment of quality & privacy along with close proximity to the area's ever-growing list of attractions & amenities.
Picture-perfect from start to finish, the home's deluxe interior showcases 4 bedrooms all with walk-in robes, large master with stylish ensuite & equally well-appointed main bathroom. Add to this a light-filled open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a classy kitchen complete with stone benchtops, ample cupboard space, walk in pantry, 900mm stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Along with ducted heating, 2x powerful split system cooling for all-seasons comfort, this feature-packed home also includes a full-size family laundry & large linen cupboards, alfresco, a low-maintenance backyard with quality synthetic turf, plus the added advantage of an internally accessed garage (remote-controlled).
Walking distance to Pinnacle Park, future recreational facilities, it will also offer easy access to the area's future schools, retail & dining precincts as well as the Hume Freeway & Donnybrook Station.

Description:
The Perfect Start for a savvy home-owner
The Perfect Start for a savvy owner
Bright and light filled is how you can describe this modern single story home, comprising of three bedrooms, a master bedroom with ensuite & walk in robe,
and built in robes to all other bedrooms, serviced with a modern set central bathroom. Well appointed kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances including gas cook-top, electric oven and dishwasher, sparkling black 40mm stone bench-tops, and ample cupboard and bench space. Decent sized low maintenance back yard and an outdoor courtyard, single remote controled garage and with an off-street car parking spot.
Other Features:
- Ducted reverse cycle heating and refrigerated cooling
- Security alarm and camera connections
- Visual intercom door-bell
- Low maintenance backyard
- High quality taps and mixers
- Instant hotwater system
For your comfort, convenience and in order to maintain health safety by minimising crowd gatherings, we highly recommend contacting us for booking a private inspection and house viewing at a time that best suites you.
To schedule a private inspection please email your name and mobile number, and I'll call you to organise a time that suites you.
Upside Contact-Free Policy
In adherence to current restrictions, Upside Realty has implemented procedures for all buyer inspections, as follows:
- Latex gloves and hand sanitisers will be provided for all inspection attendees including the agent
- Social distancing guidelines must be adhered to, including no handshaking
- All contracts issued are paperless

Description:
Light & Style with Parkland Views!
In a popular Highlands neighbourhood with the open spaces of Watermill Reserve across the
road, this modern 3 bedroom townhouse delivers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle of quality, floorplan versatility & exceptional urban ease.
Perfect for professionals, young families & savvy investors alike, the home's impressive
interior comprises a spacious master bedroom with its own private ensuite, two additional
bedrooms & main central bathroom. Adding to its appeal is a separate living room & flexible open-plan lounge/dining area - both with high ceilings - along with a well-appointed kitchen complete with stone benchtops, tiled splashbacks & stainless steel appliances.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating & split-system air-conditioning, password-
controlled alarm system, video intercom, square-set ceilings with downlights throughout, NBN
connection, robes to all bedrooms & balcony to enjoy the leafy outlook, plus a rear courtyard with decked entertaining area & remote-control double garage.
Excellent convenience to a broad range of lifestyle attractions, it's also close to local buses, popular primary & secondary schools, as well as easy access to both Highlands & Craigieburn Central shopping centres. Currently tenanted at $1658 per calendar month.

Built to impress, this near-new modern home sets itself apart with its intelligent single-level floor plan, long list of inclusions & meticulous attention to detail.
2.7m high square-set ceilings throughout, boasting an extra-large master with walk-in robe & stylish double vanity ensuite. Together with another two generous sized bedrooms both with built-in robes, sharing an immaculate family bathroom.
It's smartly configured floor plan comprises a study/second lounge, a sleek kitchen with glass splashback, 40mm waterfall stone benchtop with pendant lighting, 900mm appliances, dishwasher with ample cupboard/pantry space. Adjoining a spacious open plan meals/ family area.
Stacker doors will effortlessly lead you outside to the perfect low-maintenance backyard & completing the picture is a remote-control garage with internal entry.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, alarm & video intercom, linen storage cupboards, LED lighting, soft-close cabinetry, stone benchtops throughout & much more.
A short stroll to the bus stop on Highlander Drive, it also offers close proximity to Craigieburn's expanding range of kinder/childcare facilities, primary & secondary schools, popular parks, playgrounds & shopping centres, as well as easy access to both Mickleham Road & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
WHEN POSITION AND COMFORT MEAN EVERYTHING
Drenched in natural light and offering convenience and comfort at its best, this town home situated in the heart of Craigieburn provides every amenity at your doorstep. Only minutes walk to Craigieburn Central, public transport, Splash Aquatic Leisure Centre, public golf course, schools & parklands.
Ideal for the first home buyer or astute investor, with its spacious floorplan & unbeatable location, the homes core living area is a real highlight with its free flowing design. Encompassing a sleek modern kitchen, fully equipped with massive island bench, an abundance of cupboard space and 900mm stainless steel appliances. The adjoining open plan meals / living area allows for large family gatherings and is complemented by an intimate landscaped courtyard.
Also comprises spacious bedrooms; master bedroom with built robe & ensuite. A modern central bathroom supports the remaining sleeping quarters. Also boasts powder room, ducted heating, multiple split systems and single car garage with internal access. Dont miss a rare opportunity to purchase a property which provides the convenience people dream for!
*Please note this address is for marketing purposes only - the title particulars refer to the property as 97 Lygon Drive, Craigieburn*
